name: Release 0.4.4
body:
## What's Changed
* New PR with test cases removed for fixing counting items in Photos by @fortysix2ahead in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/98
* adding index_pause in drive_admin_console.py by @malinovsku in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/99
* update some argument for Certificate.upload_cert api by @terryding77 in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/103

## New Contributors
* @fortysix2ahead made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/98
* @malinovsku made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/99
* @terryding77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/103

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

name: Release 0.4.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Issues using additional parameters during get_file_info() #75 thanks to @AustinAres2007
* Minor changes in Readme file


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

name: Release 0.4.2
body:
## What's Changed
* add Universal search support by @VaalaCat in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/87
* Fixed: OTP login is not working because otp_code is not passed by @muqiuq in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/88
* core_backup function fixed adding taskid

## New Contributors
* @VaalaCat made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/87
* @muqiuq made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/88

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

## What's Changed
* 2fa support added by @liuerfire
* docker.py renamed into docker_api.py
* Readme instructions updated

## New Contributors
* @liuerfire made their first contribution in https://github.com/N4S4/synology-api/pull/82

## What's Changed

* Bunch functions added to core_sys_info (probably some duplicate that need to be addressed)
* Docker file added 
* LogCenter file added
* Notestation file added 
* VPN file added 
* Drive_admin_console file added 
* OAuth file added 
* Security_advisor file added
* USB_copy file added
* dhcp_server file added
* Synology Photo API added @lukas-hetzenecker
* Backup task status added thanks @therealj4nd3rs0n  and @raph2i
* SYNO.Backup API list changed fix by @raph2i
* vault.target.list() added to core_backup (Hyper Backup Vault) by @raph2i

## Contributors

* @raph2i 
* @therealj4nd3rs0n  
* @lukas-hetzenecker

name: Release 0.3
body:
# Release 0.3

- Directory server API added
- fix issue where additional_param was not returning correct value in downloadstation create_task
- typo and trailing spaces fix in readme file
- minor fix in auth.py where comparison mode has been changed to "=="
- debug added to hide login and some other messages
- gitignore added to package

name: Release 0.2.3
body:
# Release 0.2.3

- DSM 7 login integrated, it must be manually set at the login process
- Downloadstation create_task integrated with PR #64

name: Release 0.2.2
body:
# Release 0.2.2

- Fix error where get_dir_status was not returning the correct value

name: Release 0.2.1
body:
# Release 0.2.1

- Fix bug where different convention was used for core_certificate.py
- Unsecured certificate warning removed at login
- Code optimization

name: Release 0.2
body:
# Release 0.2

- Fix upload_file in Filestation where unable to upload to a non-existing folder.
- New integration _core certificates allow user to manage SSL certificate.
- Following files renamed: core_backup, core_active_backup, core_sys_info.

name: Release 0.1.3.3
body:
# Release 0.1.3.3

- Verification removed into filestation.py for upload and download functions

name: Added Backup for Business
body:
## Release 0.1.3.1 

- Added Active Backup for Business Functionality

- Bug fix where support to ssl certificate verification was not implemented completely

name: Verification added
body:
# Release 0.1.3.2

- Verification added to filestation.py into upload and download functions
